WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW

  • The 2025 Pro Tennis Tour (PTT) is launching their Tour Card on January 1, 2025
  • The program includes a Tour Card with benefits and $500,000+ in financial reward for players for their commitment and performance on the PTT. 
  • The program runs from January to December 2025
  • Program includes a Tour Card with Benefits, a Participation Bonus, and a Points Race
  • Players can earn hundreds of dollars worth of perks/benefits, and potentially $750 in a Participation Bonus, and up to $10,000 in Points Race awards

OVERVIEW

The UTR Sports Pro Tennis Tour (PTT) Tour Card program begins January 1, 2025 to further support players competing on the PTT, which over the past four years has expanded the pathway to the top of professional tennis with $25K prize money events. The PTT provides guaranteed matches in a format found nowhere else on the professional tennis landscape.

The Tour Card program will feature three tiers of benefits and reward players for both their commitment and performance. A new exciting year-long points race will motivate players to battle throughout the year while offering fans everywhere a new way to engage with the PTT.

The Tour Card is designed to provide players access to exclusive benefits and bonus eligibility for participating on the PTT. The program incentivizes players to play multiple events throughout the year, enhancing opportunities to increase their rating, earn bonuses, and receive access to benefits. The Tour Card also simplifies the entry process for events, ensuring that players meet key requirements to fully participate on the tour. Details and rules for each portion of the Tour Card program are outlined below.

HOW IT WORKS

First, after completing the essentials including integrity training and payment setups, all players on PTT will receive their Tour Card. All players to complete 2 events in the calendar year will unlock hundreds of dollars in exclusive PTT benefits, including free UTR Sports/Fabletics apparel and free Power membership with access to advanced analytics to help players’ games. Additional perks and benefits to come soon.

PARTICIPATION BONUS

Players over 18 can then earn an extra $750 by being one of the first 100 players from each gender to complete 4 events.

POINTS RACE

The 2025 PTT Season will introduce a yearlong Points Race as well. Once a player has earned their Tour Card, they can earn points based on their finish at each tournament, with an emphasis placed on high place finishes. Point distribution has been designed to reward every participant in the event. The system maintains consistency with the prize money breakdown. Players over 18 are allowed to count their 8 best events into their ranking. The top 100 players from each gender can earn anywhere from $500 up to $10,000. A minimum of 4 events must be played to receive the end of year payout.
